name: Woocommerce Products Reorder Drag Drop Multiple Sort – Sortable, Rearrange Products Vagonic
author: vagonic

sections.description:
woocommerce allows you to sort products. Sort products by category and tags quickly and easily. increase your sales.


Multi Category Sorting
Custom product sorting on category page
Label-specific product sorting
Filtering and sorting in-stock / out-of-stock products
Sorting products with multiple selection

  • Lite Features
  • Multiple selection Sort
  • Grid Structure
  • Category Sort
  • Label Sorting
  • Sorting by stocked products
  • Sort by price
  • Sort Up to 12 Items
  • Pro Features
  • Sorting for multiple categories
  • Sorting for multiple tags
  • Multiple selection Sort
  • Grid Structure
  • Category Sort
  • Label Sorting
  • Sorting by stocked products
  • Sort by price
  • Unlimited Sort Feature
  • 1 Year Update
  • 24 Hour Support

Pro Version Plugin

Vagonic Details and Reviews

ðŸ‘‰ MULTIPLE SELECT DRAG AND DROP

The common problem of Woocommerce users is not being able to customize their product category pages. With Vagonic Sortable, you can quickly organize your category and tag pages.

  • You can increase your sales by changing the location of your products.
  • Redesign your product pages with multiple selections based on category and tags.
  • You can view or customize the products you have edited in the new tab.
  • You can create new campaign pages with tags.

ðŸ‘‰ CATEGORY SELECTION

With Vagonic Sortable Panel, simply select the category you want to change the order of your products.

Specially Sorted Products in Each Category
Sort Your Products By Color
Sort Your Products By Price
Create and sort special combinations

ðŸ‘‰ TAGS SELECTION

With VAGONIC Sortable Panel, simply select the tags you want to change the order of your products.

Specially Sorted Products in Each Category
Sort Your Products By Color
Sort Your Products By Price
Create and sort special combinations

ðŸ‘‰ SORTING BY STOCK AND PRICE

You can sort according to the products that are in stock. In this way, you can hide products that are not on sale.
